title: Coordinated Federal Workforce Purge: Schedule F and DOJ Personnel Removal
summary: Trump reinstates Schedule F on first day of second presidency while simultaneously firing DOJ prosecutors involved in Trump investigations, demonstrating coordinated systematic approach to institutional capture. Actions include dismissing special counsel prosecutors Molly Gaston, J.P. Cooney, Anne McNamara and Mary Dohrmann, while directing agencies to identify 50,000 federal workers for reclassification under Schedule F.

sources.title: Trump administration fires DOJ officials who worked on criminal investigations of the president
